phrases: We are now in a state of emergency.
The tissue and blood vessels near the head area have been severely damaged.
prepare for an antigen invasion from the damaged areas,
and hurry to the scene immediately.
Tell me what is going on.
WHITE BLOOD CELLS (NEUTROPHILS): Their main task is to eliminate foreign substances from outside, such as bacteria and viruses.
Do not tell me they are all...
Zillions of blood cells getting swept up and sucked toward the mouth of the wound!
And the bleeding still has not stopped!
You know what that means, do not you?
There are no Red Blood Cells to distribute oxygen throughout the body!
The oxygen that we cells need in order to live!
The lungs and the secretion system...
I am sure the tissue cells all over the body will do whatever they can,
but there is just nothing anyone can do to fix this!
Eventually, the inside of this body will grow cold,
and starting with the distal cells, we are all going to die from lack of oxygen!
It is all over for this world!
I have come to deliver your oxygen!
Please get a hold of yourself, Cell!
I will leave this oxygen here!
I will bring you some new oxygen right away!
I am not seeing any of our friends around!
Why are they pumping so violently?
The lungs are breathing so hard!
It is not circulating to all parts of the body!
there are not nearly enough Red Blood Cells to deliver it?
This is no time to stand around and gawk!
We have got to deliver this pronto!
The cells are all waiting for us after all!
How can you have such nerves of steel?
I have come to deliver today's oxygen!
I will be bringing you more oxygen right away!
Here is your oxygen for the day!
I am here to deliver your oxygen!
I will be bringing you some new oxygen right away!
This is the blood vessel leading to the wound area!
Blood cells, please try not to get blown away!
This is the entrance to the blood vessel!
Please try not to get blown away!
Blood cells, please be careful as you move forward!
There are fewer Red Blood Cells passing through this blood vessel than ever before!
We have not been able to procure nearly enough, either!
There are not enough blood cells!
If this keeps up, we are not going to be able to send enough oxygen to the cells!
Now that it is come to this, we are going to have to provide backup!
Use blood pressure to prod the Red Blood Cells!
Make'them circulate like there is no tomorrow!
I am getting shoved from behind by the rising blood pressure!
Do not raise the blood pressure when there is a wound!
A SYMPTOM OF HEAVY BLOOD LOSS: RISING BLOOD PRESSURE: In the early stages, the sympathetic nerves grow agitated, and blood pressure rises.
A symptom of heavy blood loss.
In the early stages, the sympathetic nerves grow agitated, and blood pressure rises.
Increasing the blood pressure has caused even more heavy hemorrhaging!
Do not look behind you, Li'l Kouhai!
So let us hang in there!
A SYMPTOM OF HEAVY BLOOD LOSS: TEMPERATURE DROP: Because of a decrease in the amount of circulating blood, body temperature drops.
A symptom of heavy blood loss.
Because of a decrease in the amount of circulating blood, body temperature drops.
But we have got to go!
If at least you and I do not keep delivering oxygen,
Even if we try our hardest,
do you really believe it will change anything?
At this point, there is no way we can supply enough oxygen in time!
Aside from you and me, there are not any other Red Blood Cells!
You are just trying to show off in front of your kouhai,
stubbornly trying to hang in there!
Have not you ever heard of it?

When the body loses massive amounts of blood due to external injuries or internal bleeding from the digestive tract and such, it can no longer maintain blood pressure, and consciousness grows hazy, sometimes resulting in fainting.
Unless appropriate measures are taken, it can result in death.
It is said that the body goes into shock once it loses about a third of its blood supply.
When the body loses massive amounts of blood
due to external injuries or internal bleeding from the digestive tract and such,
it can no longer maintain blood pressure,
and consciousness grows hazy, sometimes resulting in fainting.
It is said that the body goes into shock once it loses about a third of its blood supply.
Once it loses a third of its blood, the body dies!
This body does not have a chance anymore!
I am going to keep delivering oxygen until the very end!
We are going to bulldoze right through them!
Do not be such a wuss!
Everybody, try not to get blown away by the wind!
What kind of cell are you?
Hey, that girl is dressed like a Red Blood Cell.
What kind of work do you do?
You are a young Red Blood Cell, just like us, are not you?
But that uniform design is a little different.
But she looks like us, does not she?
So, why are you all worn out?
The thing is, there was this huge wound...
but we just did not have enough people to deliver the oxygen!
You mean, unless we do something,
this body that we are in right now could be history?
I mean, we got dragged here without any explanation,
So you see, no road is long with good company!
This was all meant to be!
And since we are all Red Blood Cells, we have got to go with the flow!
We may have started out in different workplaces, but our job is the same.
All together now, let us take this oxygen!
These Red Blood Cells, who appeared out of nowhere,
managed to send oxygen to every corner of the body in a flash.
Please plug it up with your fibrin!
I am a Red Blood Cell!
You do not have to hold your breath anymore!
What a nice place this body is.
Even if it is kind of in a shambles.
LAST WORDS: PLEASE HANG THE BEDDING TO DRY -CELL
Do not be so prepared to die!
I have come to deliver your oxygen!
Please forgive me for being so late!
Thanks to the efforts of this great horde of Red Blood Cells,
and of each of the other cells,
the dangers of hemorrhagic shock were averted.
I finally managed to make my deliveries.
I wonder how many blood cells we lost.
I do not know the exact number, but probably too many to count.
Where did those new Red Blood Cells come from, I wonder.
But thanks to them, we were saved.
BLOOD DONATION: To provide blood free of charge for transfusions and blood product manufacture.
As blood for transfusions has a short shelf life, blood donation is a constant need.
One day, out of the blue, we got sucked into a strange tube,
and I do not know how to explain it, but we got twirled around,
then they made us sleep in a huge room!
And then, the next thing we knew, we were here!
TRANSFUSION: A type of treatment in which missing blood components are replenished.
Among the components that can be replaced via transfusions are red blood cells, platelets, plasma components and clotting factor.
The appropriate blood product is selected and then transfused.
A type of treatment in which missing blood components are replenished.
This is a different body than the one we were in before,
but we are glad to be able to work in a body again.
It is like they have always been here.
All right, now I am going to go look for my li'l kouhai!
Thank you so much for the tea!
There is something I would like to say to you, Senpai.
- Y-You look so fierce! - Y-You look so fierce!
Until now, I have always thought of myself as one of the more competent ones, but...
Oh, well, I actually am, but...
But today, I learned something important from you regarding work, Senpai.
Work is not just about knowledge, but also experience,
and it is also important to have a passionate heart!
I was afraid there was not anything I could teach you,
but now that you put it that way...
I am sorry that I am such a lame senpai!
But let us keep working together from now on, too!
Oh yes, nice to meet you.
before Red Blood Cell found herself getting flustered by her competent kouhai
and this horde of new friends.
This is your oxygen for the day.
That was a massive amount again today!
What are you doing in a place like this?
Do not tell me you are lost.
O-Of course I am not lost!
Well, but your map's upside down.
I was just about to make a delivery here!
Red Blood Cell, good luck to you!
Good luck to you, too, White Blood Cell!
Here is your oxygen for the day!
The cells are all working energetically again today.
